original_text: At that time, Jews who came from many different countries in the world were staying in Jerusalem. They were Jews who carefully obeyed God's Law.
korean_text: 그 때에 경건한 유대인들이 천하 각국으로부터 와서 예루살렘에 머물러 있더니

sentences.original_text: At that time, Jews who came from many different countries
sentences.korean_translation: 그때, 많은 다른 나라에서 온 유대인들이

sentences.original_text: in the world were staying in Jerusalem.
They were Jews who carefully obeyed
